results.deck: An UK based game publisher specialized in bringing JRPGs to European audiences.
results.description:
Ghostlight Ltd. is known in Europe for publishing Digital Devil Saga games for PlayStation2 and Persona 2: Innocent Sin & Persona 3 Portable for PSP.

Ghostlight is part of the Majesty House group alongside Laughing Jackal and Midas Interactive.
results.name: Ghostlight Ltd.
